description: This file defines interfaces related to warning reporting in the WPEFramework project. It declares structures for warning events and warning reporting units, including control interfaces for configuration, exclusion, and cloning functionalities.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: An interface representing a warning event with methods for categorization, serialization, deserialization, string representation, and warning status.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: An interface for a warning reporting unit, enabling warning event reporting, category information retrieval, and category list management.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: A nested interface within IWarningReportingUnit for controlling warning categories, including exclusion, configuration, and cloning capabilities.

methods.name: Exclusion
methods.description: Adds a category to the exclusion list.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the reporting control with specific settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a duplicate instance of the control.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event with an identifier and event data.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific warning category.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a warning category control to the list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a warning category control from the list.
